data.name: A Feint Plan
data.desc: A player cannot attack face-down monsters during this turn.

data.name: A Legendary Ocean
data.desc:
(This card's name is always treated as "Umi".)
All WATER monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF. Reduce the Level of all WATER monsters in both players' hands and on the field by 1.

card_sets.set_name: Realm of the Sea Emperor Structure Deck
Structure Deck: Fury from the Deep

data.name: A Wingbeat of Giant Dragon
data.desc: Return 1 Level 5 or higher Dragon-Type monster you control to the hand, and if you do, destroy all Spell and Trap Cards on the field.

card_sets.set_name: Rise of the Dragon Lords Structure Deck
Rise of the True Dragons Structure Deck
Saga of Blue-Eyes White Dragon Structure Deck

data.name: Bad Reaction to Simochi
data.desc: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, any effect of increasing your opponent's Life Points is changed to inflict the same amount of points in damage to your opponent's Life Points.

data.name: Bark of Dark Ruler
data.desc: If a Fiend-Type monster you control battles, during the Damage Step: Pay LP (in multiples of 100 points), then target the opponent's battling monster; that opponent's monster loses that much ATK and DEF, until the end of this turn.

data.name: Bubble Crash
data.desc: This card can only be activated when any player has 6 or more cards on the field and/or in their hand. The player(s) then select and send cards to their respective Graveyards until the amount remaining on the field and in their hand is 5.

data.name: Burst Breath
data.desc: Tribute 1 Dragon-Type monster; destroy all face-up monsters on the field whose DEF is less than or equal to the ATK the Tributed monster had on the field.

card_sets.set_name: Rise of the True Dragons Structure Deck

data.name: Convulsion of Nature
data.desc: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, both players must turn their respective Decks upside down and proceed with the current Duel.

data.name: Double Snare
data.desc: Destroy 1 face-up card on the field that has an effect that negates Trap Cards' effects.

data.name: Dragon Manipulator
data.desc: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up Dragon-Type monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of the End Phase.

data.name: Dragon's Gunfire
Dragon's Rage
data.desc: Dragon-Type monsters you control inflict piercing Battle Damage when they attack a Defense Position monster.

data.name: Emergency Provisions
data.desc: Send any number of other Spell/Trap Cards you control to the Graveyard; gain 1000 LP for each card sent to the Graveyard this way.

data.name: Fengsheng Mirror
data.desc: Look at your opponent's hand. Select and discard 1 Spirit monster to the Graveyard if Spirit monsters exist in his/her hand.

data.name: Fiend Comedian
data.desc: Toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, all your opponent's cards in the Graveyard are removed from play immediately. If you call it wrong, send a number of cards equal to the cards in your opponent's Graveyard from your Deck to your Graveyard.

data.name: Frontier Wiseman
data.desc: Negate any Spell effects that target a Warrior-Type monster you control, and if you do, destroy that card.

data.name: Fushi No Tori
data.desc: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, increase your Life Points by an amount equal to the Battle Damage.

data.name: Gradius' Option
data.desc: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This monster can only be Special Summoned by selecting 1 face-up "Gradius" on your side of the field. The ATK and DEF of this card becomes the same as the ATK and DEF of the selected "Gradius". If the selected "Gradius" is removed from the field, destroy this card.

data.name: Gray Wing
data.desc: Discard 1 card from your hand during your Main Phase 1. This monster can attack twice during the Battle Phase of this turn.

data.name: Great Long Nose
data.desc: This card cannot be Special Summoned. This card returns to the owner's hand during the End Phase of the turn that this card is Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points, your opponent skips their next Battle Phase.

data.name: Heart of Clear Water
data.desc: If the equipped monster's ATK is 1300 or higher, this card is destroyed. The monster equipped with this card is not destroyed as a result of battle or by the effect of a card that targets the monster. (Damage calculation is applied normally.)

data.name: Life Absorbing Machine
data.desc: During your Standby Phase, gain Life Points equal to half of the total Life Points you paid during your last turn.

data.name: Lizard Soldier
data.desc: A beast soldier derived from dragons, it is small for a Dragon-Type. Moving very quickly, this monster is an excellent strategist.

data.name: Mysterious Guard
data.desc: FLIP: Target 1 face-up monster on the field, and if you control a face-up Warrior-Type monster, you can target 1 additional face-up monster on the field; return the first target to the top of the Deck, then return the additional target (if any) to the hand if you still control a face-up Warrior-Type monster.

data.name: Nutrient Z
data.desc: During damage calculation, when you are about to take 2000 or more battle damage: Gain 4000 LP first.

data.name: Ominous Fortunetelling
data.desc: During your Standby Phase, select 1 random card from your opponent's hand. Call the type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap). If you call it right, inflict 700 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points. You can use this effect only once per turn.

data.name: Patrician of Darkness
data.desc: You choose the attack targets for your opponent's attacks.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack
Speed Duel: Trials of the Kingdom

data.name: Possessed Dark Soul
data.desc: You can Tribute this face-up card; take control of all face-up Level 3 or lower monsters your opponent currently controls.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

data.name: Ready for Intercepting
data.desc: Target 1 Warrior or Spellcaster monster on the field; change that target to face-down Defense Position.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Attack from the Deep

data.name: Robolady
data.desc: A warrior fully covered with metal. It upgrades by fusing with "Roboyarou".

data.name: Robotic Knight
data.desc: The Commander of Machine-Types, he serves the Machine King. He is famous for the way he controls his troops.

data.name: Roboyarou
data.desc: A warrior fully covered with metal. It upgrades by fusing with "Robolady".

data.name: Ryu-Kishin Clown
data.desc: When this card is Summoned (including Flip Summon and Special Summon), select 1 face-up monster on the field and change its battle position.

data.name: Serpentine Princess
data.desc: If this face-up card is returned from the field to your Deck, select and Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower monster from your Deck to your side of the field. Then shuffle your Deck.

data.name: Skull Knight #2
data.desc: If you Tribute Summon a Fiend-Type monster by Tributing this monster, Special Summon 1 "Skull Knight #2" from your Deck. Then shuffle your Deck.

data.name: Soul Demolition
data.desc: You can only activate this card's effect when you have a Fiend-Type monster on your side of the field. Pay 500 Life Points to use this effect. Both players select 1 Monster Card from their opponent's Graveyard. Remove the selected cards from play.

data.name: Spirit Ryu
data.desc: During your Battle Step, if this card battles (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Dragon monster to the GY; this card gains 1000 ATK/DEF until the end of the Battle Phase.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

data.name: Spirit's Invitation
data.desc: Each time your Spirit monster returns to your hand, select 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field and return it to its owner's hand. Pay 500 Life Points during each of your Standby Phases. If you do not, destroy this card.

data.name: Spiritual Energy Settle Machine
data.desc: As long as this card remains face-up on the field, all Spirit monsters remain face-up on the field and do not return to their owners' hands during the End Phase even if they are Normal Summoned or flipped face-up. Discard 1 card from your hand during each of your End Phases. If you do not, destroy this card. When this card is removed from the field, all face-up Spirit monsters return to the owners' hands.

data.name: Spring of Rebirth
data.desc: Increase your Life Points by 500 points every time monsters return from the field to the owner's hand.

data.name: Stamping Destruction
data.desc: If you control a Dragon monster: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target, and if you do, inflict 500 damage to its controller.

card_sets.set_name: Saga of Blue-Eyes White Dragon Structure Deck
Speed Duel Starter Decks: Duelists of Tomorrow

data.name: Super Rejuvenation
data.desc: During the End Phase of the turn this card was activated, draw a number of cards equal to the combined number of Dragon monsters you discarded or Tributed from your hand or field this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Super Robolady
data.desc:
"Robolady" + "Roboyarou"
You can Special Summon "Super Roboyarou" by returning this card from the field to the Extra Deck. You cannot use this effect during the same turn this monster is Special Summoned. In addition, increase the ATK of this monster by 1000 points during the Damage Step when this monster inflicts Direct Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

data.name: Super Roboyarou
data.desc:
"Roboyarou" + "Robolady"
You can Special Summon "Super Robolady" by returning this card from the field to the Extra Deck. You cannot use this effect during the same turn this monster is Special Summoned. In addition, increase the ATK of this monster by 1000 points during the Damage Step when this monster battles with a monster.

data.name: The Dragon Dwelling in the Cave
data.desc: A huge dragon dwelling in a cave. It is horrible when it gets angry, although it is usually quiet. It is said to preserve certain treasures.

data.name: The Hunter with 7 Weapons
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned, declare 1 Type of monster. When battling that Type of monster, increase the ATK of this card by 1000 points during Damage Calculation.

data.name: The Illusory Gentleman
data.desc: Wearing odd fashions, this gentleman is very fickle. He sometimes saves people and at other times commits crimes.

data.name: The Puppet Magic of Dark Ruler
data.desc: Select 1 Fiend-Type monster from your Graveyard. Remove from play monsters on your side of the field whose total Levels exactly equal the Level of the selected Fiend-Type monster. Then Special Summon the selected monster from your Graveyard.

data.name: The Secret of the Bandit
data.desc: This card can only be activated during Main Phase 1. Select 1 face-up monster on the field. Each time the selected monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points this turn, your opponent discards 1 random card.

data.name: Throwstone Unit
data.desc: Tribute 1 Warrior-Type monster on your side of the field to destroy 1 face-up monster on the field whose DEF is equal to or less than the ATK of this card.

data.name: Troop Dragon
data.desc: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Special Summon 1 "Troop Dragon" from your Deck.

data.name: Twin-Headed Wolf
data.desc: While you control another Fiend monster, negate the effects of Flip monsters destroyed by battle with this card.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Twisted Nightmares

data.name: Warrior Dai Grepher
data.desc: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Attack from the Deep

data.name: Winged Minion
data.desc: Tribute this face-up card. Select 1 face-up Fiend-Type monster on the field. Increase the ATK and DEF of the monster by 700 points as long as it remains face-up on the field.

data.name: Wolf Axwielder
data.desc: Once it has started battle, this monster attacks fiercely and cannot stop.

data.name: Woodland Sprite
data.desc: Send 1 Equip Card equipped to this card to the Graveyard. Inflict 500 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.
